title: Working Through Different Financial Priorities
itunes:summary:
In a marriage, one spouse tends to save money while the other prefers to spend it. When that's the case, how can you work together? John, Greg and Erin offer some ideas for how to get on the same page financially in your relationship.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Thriving in Money" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-06-22?refcd=1103302

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/working-through-different-financial-priorities/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
